items.title: Suspect sought as New York Jets player Kris Boyd in critical condition after shooting
items.description: New York Jets player Kris Boyd is in critical but stable condition after being shot early Sunday morning.

items.title: WATCH:  Chihuahua's viral moment hearing Spanish helps him find a home
items.description: ABC News' Danny New shares the heartwarming story of how a viral social media clip helped Nacho the chihuahua find his forever home.
